release.description: This release of the Search Service is a component of the integrated release 3.0.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Allow for VOTable response from PDS Search Protocol.
Updated Solr schema to include form search fields.
Updated Solr schema to allow for multiple node_ids.

release.description: This release of the Search Service is a component of the integrated release 2.2.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Updated Solr schema to include archive-status, in accordance with PDS Protocol.
Modified stylesheets to hide archive-status from user, but still include '-archive-status:SUPERSEDED' in all searches.
Updated Solr configuration to now point to PDS Protocol as default search protocol.
Updated site operation docs to include common errors that may occur during installation and/or operation.
Removed the parent project's Release Notes document. This document now serves as the single source for this component's release changes.

release.description: This release of the Search Service is a component of the integrated release 2.1.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Cleaned up the documentation and removed the PDF generation feature.

release.description: This release of the Search Service is a component of the integrated release 2.0.0 of the PDS 2010 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: PDS-specific stylesheets and configurations in order to function with data search interface.

Assembly descriptor to make directory Solr expects for its home.
Configure PDS Search Protocol end point.
